attributes.action: Make using tax payers money to bribe parties for political self gain illegal
attributes.background: Theresa May explained the continued pay cap on emergency services was due to there not being a "magic money tree" at use. Yet a £1billion deal from the taxpayer was made between her and the DUP as a result of losing the majority vote in an election, without permission from the majority who voted

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
